title: Cosby team arrives at court, main accuser to testify
text:
Cosby team arrives at court, main accuser to testify 10:15am EDT - 01:05 
Bill Cosby's spokesman Andrew Wyatt appeals for fairness as Andrea Constand, the woman at the center of the sexual assault case against Bill Cosby, prepares to take the stand in a Pennsylvania courtroom. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Bill Cosby's spokesman Andrew Wyatt appeals for fairness as Andrea Constand, the woman at the center of the sexual assault case against Bill Cosby, prepares to take the stand in a Pennsylvania courtroom.
